attributes.action: If Brexit means Brexit could new Prime Minister spell out what in fact it means
attributes.additional_details:
Guardian article published by Patrick Wintour on 14 July 2016 highlights a number of Brexit options

https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2016/jul/14/whats-the-best-brexit-theresa-may-could-get-for-britain

Article claims government had not conducted any prior assessment of type of Brexit UK citizens would be offered.

Citizens of UK demand democratic right to vote on the type of Brexit the new Prime Minister seems so insistent Brexit means Brexit, but citizens have no idea what it means to them
attributes.background:
New Prime Minister Theresa May claims Brexit means Brexit

UK Citizens don't in fact know what Brexit in fact means in practice to their lives & how it will impact them.
 
Citizens of UK demand government publish & hold referendum so citizens determine type of Brexit before triggering article 50
